name: Hot Ginger Apple Cider With Applejack
description: This recipe amps up the classic mulled cider with a heck of a lot of ginger, which gives it a spicy quality perfect for cold nights.

recipeInstructions.text: In a medium saucepan, bring apple cider, brown sugar, cloves, cinnamon and ginger to a boil over high heat, then reduce to a simmer. Cook for 10 minutes. Remove pot from heat, cover, and let it infuse for 10 minutes.
Add applejack and pour through a strainer into serving glasses. Garnish each glass with a cinnamon stick if desired.
